oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: When Irish Eyes Are Smiling performance ; I'll Hold You In My Heart (Till I Can Hold You In My Arms) - Eddy Arnold performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of When Irish Eyes Are Smiling, written by Chauncey Olcott, George Graff, and Ernest Ball, and performed by an unconfirmed voice with band accompaniment. Performance of I'll Hold You In My Heart (Till I Can Hold You In My Arms), written by Eddy Arnold and Thomas Dilbeck, and performed by Eddy Arnold.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unconfirmed] performs "When Irish Eyes Are Smiling" [incomplete] / (1:38) Eddy Arnold performs "I'll Hold You In My Heart (Till I Can Hold You In My Arms)"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Olcott, Chauncey, 1858-1932; Graff, George, 1886-1973; Dilbeck, Tommy
